video_title: Top 5 Reasons People Hide Their Depression
transcript:
I'm a psychologist and here's my top
five reasons people might hide their
depression number five they believe that
other people might see their depression
as a character flaw or a sign of
weakness number four they're not sure
how people might react so they might not
even tell their partner or closest
friends for fear of losing them number
three they worry that people at work
might question their ability to do their
job number two they might not even fully
understand it themselves so it can be
really hard to put into words or the
shame can be so unbearable that it's
hard to say out loud and number one
depression tells them they're the only
one so they can't imagine how anyone
else could truly understand
